base_description: Green-lensed glasses with white temples, rectangular shape.
part_description: Two rectangular green lenses, two white curved temples. Lenses positioned at the front, temples extend backward from lens edges.
internal_interaction_description: The lenses are fixed within the front frame, providing a stable viewing area. The temples are hinged at the outer edges of the lenses, allowing them to fold inward for compact storage. The hinges facilitate smooth opening and closing, ensuring the glasses can be worn comfortably and securely.
external_interaction_description: These glasses are worn on the face, resting on the nose and ears. The lenses filter light and offer protection for the eyes. The temples provide support and hold the glasses in place, interacting with the ears to maintain stability during movement. They are suitable for outdoor use.
